flor.name: Flor Castarataro
flor.title: Strategy & Creative Direction
flor.description: Designer specialized in creative strategy for healthcare & pharmaceutical companies. Leads the overall concept of each video, ensuring that each piece is clear, relevant and aligned with business objectives.

nat.name: Natalia Balza
nat.title: Art Direction
nat.description: Illustrator, animator and graphic designer with more than 6 years in animation and 4 in bio-tech & healthcare industries. Defines the visual direction of projects, creating graphic solutions that convey messages precisely and attractively.
